amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to strike a reference to a job corps center on Treasure Island in Section 114 and replace it with the job corps center located in San Marcos, Texas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cloud amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cloud amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cloud amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
